title: Tesla reports 15% increase in Q2 vehicle deliveries
content: Tesla announced that its vehicle deliveries increased by 15% in the second quarter compared to last year, driven by strong demand in Europe and China.

title: Tesla stock falls after margin concerns
content: Shares of Tesla dropped 4% after analysts raised concerns about declining profit margins due to price cuts across key markets.

title: Tesla opens new Gigafactory in Mexico
content: Tesla has officially opened its new Gigafactory in Monterrey, Mexico, expected to produce 1 million vehicles annually by 2027.

title: Tesla faces lawsuit over Autopilot safety claims
content: A class-action lawsuit has been filed against Tesla alleging misleading statements about the safety of its Autopilot system.

title: Tesla's Cybertruck production hits 20,000 units
content: Tesla announced it has produced over 20,000 Cybertrucks, exceeding its Q1 target and signaling strong ramp-up in manufacturing.

title: Tesla cuts prices in China amid rising competition
content: Tesla reduced Model Y prices in China by 8% to counter growing competition from BYD and NIO, pressuring short-term margins.

title: Elon Musk announces Tesla AI Day 2025
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk revealed plans for AI Day 2025, highlighting advancements in Dojo supercomputer and robotaxi technology.

title: Tesla's solar business underperforms expectations
content: Tesla's energy division reported weaker-than-expected solar deployment, causing concern over diversification strategy.

title: Tesla achieves record quarterly revenue
content: Tesla reported record revenue of $28.5 billion in Q1 2025, driven by strong vehicle sales and energy storage growth.

title: Regulatory delays hit Tesla's Full Self-Driving rollout
content: U.S. regulators have delayed approval for Tesla's Full Self-Driving v12.5, citing unresolved safety validation issues.

title: Tesla partners with Panasonic on next-gen batteries
content: Tesla and Panasonic announced a joint R&D initiative for 4680 battery cells with 20% higher energy density.

title: Tesla stock downgraded by Morgan Stanley
content: Morgan Stanley downgraded Tesla to 'Equal Weight' citing valuation concerns and slowing EV adoption in North America.

title: Tesla's Berlin factory reaches 5,000 vehicles/week
content: Tesla’s Gigafactory Berlin has hit a production milestone of 5,000 vehicles per week, boosting European supply.

title: Tesla recalls 100,000 vehicles over software glitch
content: Tesla issued a recall for 100,000 Model 3 and Model Y cars due to a potential brake system software error.

title: Tesla's Dojo supercomputer accelerates AI training
content: Tesla's in-house Dojo supercomputer has reduced AI training time for vision models by 70%, engineers report.

title: Tesla faces unionization efforts in Texas
content: Workers at Tesla's Austin factory have filed for union representation, marking the first major U.S. union push.

title: Tesla's FSD subscription revenue grows 40%
content: Tesla reported a 40% year-over-year increase in Full Self-Driving subscription revenue, now exceeding $500M annually.

title: Tesla's China sales drop 12% YoY
content: Tesla China deliveries fell 12% in September compared to last year due to intense local competition and economic slowdown.

title: Tesla launches new Model 2 prototype
content: Tesla unveiled a prototype of its long-awaited $25,000 Model 2, targeting mass-market adoption in emerging markets.

title: Tesla sued over misleading range claims
content: A consumer group filed a lawsuit alleging Tesla exaggerated real-world range of Model S in official documentation.

title: Tesla energy storage deployments double
content: Tesla's Megapack deployments doubled year-over-year, with major projects in Texas and Australia driving growth.

title: Tesla delays robotaxi unveiling to 2025
content: Tesla has pushed back its robotaxi unveiling event from August to October 2025 due to regulatory preparation.

title: Tesla's Q3 earnings beat expectations
content: Tesla reported EPS of $0.85 vs $0.72 expected, with automotive gross margin stabilizing at 17.8%.

title: Tesla CFO sells $5M in stock
content: Tesla CFO Vaibhav Taneja sold $5 million worth of shares, triggering minor market concern over insider confidence.

title: Tesla expands Supercharger network in India
content: Tesla has signed agreements to roll out 500 Supercharger stations across India by end of 2025.

title: Apple unveils new AI features for iPhone
content: Apple revealed a new set of AI-powered features for the upcoming iPhone, boosting investor optimism and lifting the stock by 3%.

title: Apple faces regulatory pressure in EU
content: The company is under investigation for potential antitrust violations in Europe, creating uncertainty for long-term growth.

title: Apple's Vision Pro sales exceed expectations
content: Apple reported strong initial sales of Vision Pro, with over 300,000 units sold in the first quarter post-launch.

title: Apple supplier faces labor violations in Vietnam
content: An Apple supplier in Vietnam was cited for excessive overtime and poor working conditions, raising ESG concerns.

title: Apple announces $90B share buyback
content: Apple's board approved a $90 billion share repurchase program, the largest in corporate history, signaling strong cash flow.

title: Apple delays AI integration in Europe
content: Apple will delay rollout of new AI features in the EU due to compliance with the Digital Markets Act.

title: iPhone 17 prototypes feature under-display Face ID
content: Leaks reveal iPhone 17 prototypes with fully under-display Face ID, potentially enabling a true full-screen design.

title: Apple services revenue hits all-time high
content: Apple's services segment, including App Store and iCloud, reached $25 billion in quarterly revenue for the first time.

title: Apple fined $1.2B in EU antitrust case
content: The European Commission imposed a $1.2 billion fine on Apple for anti-competitive practices in music streaming.

title: Apple partners with Alibaba on AI in China
content: Apple and Alibaba formed a strategic partnership to develop localized AI models for Siri and iMessage in China.

title: Apple's India manufacturing capacity doubles
content: Apple has doubled iPhone production in India, with over 25% of global output now coming from the region.

title: Apple stock hit by China iPhone ban rumors
content: Shares fell 2.5% on unconfirmed reports that China may restrict government employees from using iPhones.

title: Apple Watch detects early signs of heart condition in study
content: A Stanford-led study confirmed Apple Watch can detect atrial fibrillation with 92% accuracy, validating health claims.

title: Apple's Q1 earnings miss on weak iPhone demand
content: Apple reported lower-than-expected iPhone sales in China and Europe, causing EPS to fall short of analyst estimates.

title: Apple opens first store in Vietnam
content: Apple inaugurated its first retail store in Ho Chi Minh City, marking a major push into Southeast Asia.

title: Apple sued over App Store commission rates
content: A coalition of developers filed a new lawsuit challenging Apple's 15–30% App Store commission as anti-competitive.

title: Apple's M4 chip powers new MacBook Air
content: Apple launched new MacBook Air with M4 chip, offering 50% faster AI performance and 18-hour battery life.

title: Apple's dividend increased by 5%
content: Apple announced a 5% increase in its quarterly dividend, continuing its streak of annual dividend hikes.

title: Apple faces backlash over data privacy policy
content: New iOS data collection practices sparked criticism from privacy advocates and EU regulators.

title: Apple's India revenue grows 35% YoY
content: Apple reported 35% year-over-year revenue growth in India, driven by local manufacturing and rising premium demand.

title: Apple delays EV project indefinitely
content: Apple has officially shelved its 'Project Titan' electric vehicle initiative to focus on AI and spatial computing.

title: Apple's cash reserves exceed $200 billion
content: Apple's cash and marketable securities surpassed $200 billion, reinforcing its financial fortress amid global uncertainty.

title: Apple CEO Tim Cook visits Vietnam factory
content: Tim Cook made a rare visit to Apple's supplier factories in Vietnam, signaling deeper supply chain diversification.

title: Apple's App Store faces new EU regulation
content: The EU forced Apple to allow third-party app stores on iOS, potentially reducing App Store revenue in Europe.

title: Apple's AR headset sales projected to double
content: Analysts project Vision Pro sales to double in 2025 as enterprise adoption accelerates in healthcare and design sectors.

title: Microsoft announces partnership with major AI lab
content: Microsoft has entered a new partnership focused on advanced AI research, expected to enhance cloud adoption among enterprise customers.

title: Microsoft faces slowdown in cloud segment
content: Despite strong overall performance, Azure's growth slowed compared to previous quarters, causing concerns among investors.

title: Microsoft's Copilot reaches 200M monthly users
content: Microsoft announced Copilot has surpassed 200 million monthly active users across Windows, Office, and Edge.

title: Microsoft fined $2.1B in EU antitrust case
content: The European Commission fined Microsoft $2.1 billion for bundling Teams with Office without offering unbundled options.

title: Microsoft Q3 revenue grows 14% YoY
content: Microsoft reported $65.2B in revenue for Q3, driven by strong performance in Azure and AI services.

title: Microsoft lays off 3,000 employees in gaming division
content: Microsoft cut 3,000 jobs in Activision Blizzard and Xbox divisions as part of post-acquisition restructuring.

title: Microsoft launches AI-powered Windows 12
content: Microsoft unveiled Windows 12 with deep AI integration, including real-time language translation and smart automation.

title: Microsoft's GitHub Copilot faces copyright lawsuit
content: A group of developers sued Microsoft over GitHub Copilot, alleging it reproduces copyrighted code without attribution.

title: Azure AI Studio gains enterprise traction
content: Microsoft's Azure AI Studio is now used by over 60% of Fortune 500 companies for custom model development.

title: Microsoft opens AI research center in Toronto
content: Microsoft expanded its AI research footprint with a new center in Toronto, focused on responsible AI and healthcare.

title: Microsoft's Surface sales decline 8%
content: Surface hardware revenue fell 8% YoY due to extended PC replacement cycles and strong competition from Apple.

title: Microsoft increases dividend by 10%
content: Microsoft raised its quarterly dividend by 10%, reflecting strong cash flow and shareholder commitment.

title: Microsoft Teams adds real-time AI transcription
content: Microsoft Teams now offers AI-powered live transcription with speaker identification and translation.

title: Microsoft's cloud infrastructure hit by outage
content: A major Azure outage affected thousands of businesses across North America for over 4 hours, raising reliability concerns.

title: Microsoft signs $10B AI deal with U.S. government
content: Microsoft secured a $10 billion contract to provide AI and cloud services to multiple U.S. federal agencies.

title: Microsoft's Xbox Game Pass surpasses 35M subscribers
content: Microsoft reported over 35 million Xbox Game Pass subscribers, making it the largest gaming subscription service globally.

title: Microsoft faces antitrust probe in UK
content: The UK's CMA launched an investigation into Microsoft's cloud and AI dominance in the enterprise market.

title: Microsoft's AI revenue exceeds $20B annually
content: Microsoft disclosed that AI-related products now generate over $20 billion in annual revenue, up from $5B in 2023.

title: Microsoft acquires cybersecurity startup for $2.5B
content: Microsoft bought a leading AI-native cybersecurity firm to bolster its Microsoft Security Copilot offering.

title: Microsoft's LinkedIn revenue grows 12%
content: LinkedIn reported 12% year-over-year revenue growth, driven by Talent Solutions and Marketing Solutions.

title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella receives $50M bonus
content: Satya Nadella was awarded a $50 million performance bonus tied to AI and cloud growth milestones.

title: Microsoft's carbon-negative pledge on track
content: Microsoft confirmed it remains on track to be carbon-negative by 2030, with 10 million tons of CO2 removed in 2024.

title: Microsoft launches AI coding assistant for Python
content: Microsoft introduced a specialized AI assistant for Python developers, integrated into Visual Studio Code.

title: Microsoft's advertising revenue surges
content: Microsoft reported 25% growth in advertising revenue from Bing and LinkedIn, benefiting from AI-enhanced targeting.

title: Microsoft partners with NVIDIA on AI chips
content: Microsoft and NVIDIA announced a partnership to co-design custom AI chips for Azure data centers.

title: Amazon expands operations in Southeast Asia
content: Amazon announced its expansion into Southeast Asia as it seeks new markets for e-commerce and cloud infrastructure services.

title: Amazon shares dip after weak Q1 outlook
content: The company issued a weaker-than-expected Q1 guidance, leading to a slight decline in share price during pre-market trading.

title: Amazon launches AI-powered shopping assistant
content: Amazon introduced 'Rufus', an AI shopping assistant that answers product questions and compares prices in real time.

title: Amazon faces warehouse union vote in California
content: Workers at an Amazon fulfillment center in California are voting on union representation this week.

title: Amazon Web Services revenue hits $28B
content: AWS reported $28 billion in quarterly revenue, growing 16% YoY despite increased competition from Azure and GCP.

title: Amazon fined $1.5B in German antitrust case
content: Germany's Federal Cartel Office fined Amazon $1.5 billion for self-preferencing its own products on the marketplace.

title: Amazon Prime membership exceeds 220M globally
content: Amazon announced over 220 million Prime members worldwide, with strong growth in India and Brazil.

title: Amazon delays drone delivery expansion
content: Amazon has postponed nationwide rollout of Prime Air drone delivery due to FAA regulatory hurdles.

title: Amazon's advertising revenue surges 24%
content: Amazon reported 24% year-over-year growth in ad revenue, now rivaling Google and Meta in digital ad market share.

title: Amazon acquires robotics company for warehouse automation
content: Amazon bought a Boston-based robotics firm for $800 million to accelerate automation in fulfillment centers.

title: Amazon Q4 earnings beat estimates
content: Amazon reported EPS of $1.02 vs $0.85 expected, driven by strong AWS and advertising performance.

title: Amazon faces lawsuit over Alexa data collection
content: A class-action lawsuit alleges Amazon retains Alexa voice recordings without proper user consent.

title: Amazon launches satellite internet service
content: Amazon's Project Kuiper has begun beta testing its satellite internet service in rural U.S. regions.

title: Amazon's healthcare venture expands to 10 states
content: Amazon Clinic, the company's virtual healthcare service, is now available in 10 U.S. states.

title: Amazon stock split announced
content: Amazon's board approved a 20-for-1 stock split, effective June 2025, to make shares more accessible to employees and retail investors.

title: Amazon lays off 1,500 employees in devices division
content: Amazon cut 1,500 jobs in its devices and services division, including Alexa and Echo teams, amid AI restructuring.

title: Amazon's same-day delivery expands to 20 new cities
content: Amazon announced same-day delivery for Prime members in 20 additional U.S. cities, enhancing logistics dominance.

title: Amazon sued over counterfeit goods
content: A major brand coalition sued Amazon for allegedly failing to prevent counterfeit products on its marketplace.

title: Amazon's renewable energy investments reach 50 GW
content: Amazon has now invested in 50 gigawatts of renewable energy projects, the largest corporate buyer globally.

title: Amazon Pharmacy partners with major insurers
content: Amazon Pharmacy announced partnerships with UnitedHealth and Aetna to offer discounted prescription delivery.

title: Amazon's international segment returns to profit
content: After 5 quarters of losses, Amazon's international operations posted a small profit, driven by India and Middle East.

title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy sells $20M in stock
content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy sold $20 million worth of shares as part of a pre-arranged trading plan.

title: Amazon opens first physical apparel store
content: Amazon launched its first brick-and-mortar clothing store in New York City, featuring AI-powered fitting rooms.

title: Amazon's logistics network now larger than FedEx
content: Amazon's delivery network surpassed FedEx in U.S. package volume, according to new industry data.

title: Amazon Web Services launches AI model marketplace
content: AWS introduced a new marketplace for third-party AI models, allowing customers to buy, deploy, and fine-tune models instantly.
